stimulusHtml: When the moon is at point B, the distance from the moon to the center of the planet is most nearly

features.html: A moon of mass m orbits a planet of mass 49m in an elliptical orbit as shown above. When the moon is at point A, its distance from the center of the planet is rA and its speed is v0. When the moon is at point B, its speed is 5v0.
